verses.verse: "For, <S%H3117><s%> behold, the day comes, <S%H935><s%> it burns <S%H1197><s%> as a furnace; <S%H8574><s%> and all the proud, <S%H2086><s%> and all who work <S%H6213><s%> wickedness, <S%H7564><s%> will be stubble; <S%H7179><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> that comes <S%H935><s%> will burn them up, <S%H3857><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "that it shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither root <S%H8328><s%> nor branch. <S%H6057><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to him in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> for all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances. <S%H4941><s%>

He will turn <S%H7725><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> to the children, <S%H1121><s%> and the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> lest I come <S%H935><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with a curse. <S%H2764><s%>"
